ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:16:32 [Issue ID 4000-129544] urn:comicvine:4000-129544 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:30:36. [Issue ID 93835]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Yul Brynner Used Volatilis...Then He Took A Shower: Volatilis Formula V-17 helps you lose your hair painlessly.
Cars To Match Careers: Ideas for cars designed to show off something about their owner's careers. Text is in verse.
If Comic Strip Characters Answered Those Little Ads: A look at what might happen if comic strip characters answered real world magazine ads for self improvement.
Backyard Barbecue: The problems and future of life at the outdoor grill.
MAD Beats The Heat: New ideas for cooling clothing and accessories to wear in the summer.
The Hunting Song: Story in song about hunting gone wrong, complete with score.
Future TV Ad: Storyboard of possible tv ad for local police departments.
How To Crop A Photo: Story of Clyde's life told with his cropped photos compared to the originals.
MAD's Up-To-Date Sky: New names for constellations, reflecting modern pop culture.
Scenes We'd Like To See: The Beast Falls In Love: Gorilla falls in love with man and carries him away, instead of girl.
How To Read Your Palm: Phony meanings for various parts of people's palms.
MAD Eating Utensils: New ideas for eating utensils to solve age-old problems.
House To House: Ed visits with his wife and son on live tv, and ends up thrown out of the house.
The Seaside Incident: Three fellows blow up their floating toys, but one has a toy not intended for the water.
Future Specialized Magazines: Ideas for niche market magazines that haven't been published yet.
Scenes We'd Like To See: Tied To The Powder Keg: After the villain ties a girl to a gunpowder keg and lights a fuse, the hero beats him...but not in time to defuse the keg.
Sin-Doll Ella: A mixture of Cinderella and A Streetcar Named Desire, in which the Fairy Godmother gets the Prince.
